m1l* repeat to end 8sts increased 76sts total all sizes start knitting the colourwork chart on page 6 joining each colour where shown the chart is worked from right to left bottom to top and is knit 17 18 19 times in one round the row are repeated again after row 40 knit the leg and finish on row 4 of the chart after having knitted the 40 row once you can modify the length by finishing on a row that uses only one colour in that round the colour you finish on will be the colour of your heel cut all yarns except the yellow or whichever colour you will knit the heel with `no wraps`short row heel the short row heel will now be worked flat and knit back and forth using needle 1 and cc2 yellow currently needle 1 is holding 34 36 38 sts small size only row 1 *k6 k2tog * 4 times knit 1st decreases 4sts now 30sts total on needle 1 and turn sock to the ws purl side there was one remaining last stitch unknitted row 2 sl1 p27 leaving again 1 stitch unworked at the end and turn sock to the rs knit side row 3 sl1 k26 this leaves 2sts unworked at the end and turn sock to the ws purl side row 4 sl1 p25 you are turning at the last stitch before the gap row 5 sl1 k24 turning the stitch before the gap row 6 sl1 p23 turning the stitch before the gap continue the knit and purl sides slipping 1st and turning work at the stitch before the gap ending on… row 16 sl1 p11 turn there are now 9 sts on the left side and 9 sts on the right side of the purl sts the heel now needs to be worked back and forth closing the gaps that have been created from turning the work row 17 sl1 k10 k2tog this is 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap knitted together m1k stitch picking up the stitch under the k2tog stitch *please see diagram a do not twist the stitch turn work to ws purl side row 18 sl1 p11 p2tog again 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap purled together m1p stitch picking up the stitch under the p2tog stitch **please see diagram b do not twist stitch turn work to rs knit side row 19 sl1 k12 k2tog m1k row 20 sl1 p13 p2tog m1p continue in this manner k2tog or p2tog the 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap together and then m1k or m1p in the stitch under the k2tog or
